text: Patrick Lindesay Archibald Godfrey (born 13 February 1933) is an English actor. He is known for his roles in A Room with a View, The Remains of the Day, The Importance of Being Earnest, The Count of Monte Cristo, Dimensions and Les Mis√©rables. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London
